distinctive_traits: High shadow contrast, wide exposure latitude

film_info.description: Iconic high-speed black-and-white film known for its fine grain, high sharpness and wide exposure latitude.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain increases with higher ISO and push processing
technical_specs.age_effects: aging can increase base fog and alter grain appearance
technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: minimal with modern scanners; fine grain reproduction

film_info.description: Ilford HP5 Plus 400 is a high-speed, fine-grain B&W film with medium contrast and outstanding sharpness.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain increases with higher exposure index

film_info.description: Kodak T-Max 100 is an ISO 100 B&W film with extremely fine grain and very high sharpness.

technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: T-grain structure can appear as very fine grain in scans

film_info.description: Kodak T-Max 400 is a professional ISO 400 B&W film with exceptionally fine grain due to its T-grain emulsion.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain very fine for 400, linear increase if pushed

film_info.description: Kodak T-Max 3200 is a high-speed (multi-speed) B&W film designed for extremely low-light conditions, combining fast exposure with finer grain than typical ultra-fast films.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain increases significantly at high EI
technical_specs.age_effects: sensitivity to moisture and sulfur air pollutants
technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: grain very noticeable, but no color dyes

film_info.description: Kodak Plus-X 125 is a medium-speed (ISO 125) B&W film known for its extremely fine grain and excellent sharpness.
Kodak Technical Pan is a slow (ISO 25) high-resolution B&W film with unmatched fine grain‚Äîespecially at low speeds‚Äîand exceptional detail preservation.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain minimal at low ISO; pushing greatly increases grain
technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: very fine grain, risk of moir√© at high resolution

film_info.description: Ilford FP4 Plus is a medium-speed (ISO 125) all-purpose B&W film with very fine grain and outstanding sharpness.
Ilford Delta 100 is an ISO 100 B&W film with exceptionally fine grain and very high sharpness, ideal for maximum detail.

distinctive_traits: T-grain technology for low visible grain

film_info.description: Ilford Delta 400 is a medium-speed (ISO 400) B&W film using T-grain emulsion, offering exceptionally fine grain and mild contrast.

technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: virtually no grain in normal scans

film_info.description: Ilford Delta 3200 is a high-speed (EI 3200) B&W film designed for low-light work, combining high sensitivity with an unobtrusive grain structure and wide tonal range.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain minimal for EI 3200 but clearly visible
technical_specs.age_effects: prefers cool, dry storage; base fog rises with age
technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: high grain, especially in deep shadows

film_info.description: Ilford Pan F Plus is a slow-speed (ISO 50) B&W film offering exceptionally fine grain, razor-sharp detail and high contrast.
Fujifilm Neopan Acros 100 is a professional ISO 100 B&W film with ultra-fine grain and superb sharpness.
Fujifilm Neopan 400 is an ISO 400 B&W film known for its very fine grain, high sharpness and good pushability.
Fujifilm Neopan 1600 is a high-speed (ISO 1600) B&W film with noticeable grain and strong tonality; discontinued but prized for its distinctive rendering.

technical_specs.age_effects: prone to color shifts over time

distinctive_traits: Exceptionally fine grain for color film

film_info.description: Kodak Portra 160 is a low-speed color negative film known for its very fine grain, natural skin tones and wide exposure latitude.
Kodak Portra 400 is a versatile ISO 400 color negative film famous for very fine grain and natural skin tones.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain remains relatively fine at ISO 400
technical_specs.cross_process_effects: cross processing yields strong color shifts
technical_specs.age_effects: color shifts with age, muted contrast

film_info.description: Kodak Portra 800 is a high-speed colour negative film known for fine grain (for its speed) and warm, saturated tones.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain visible at ISO 800 but controlled by small crystals

film_info.description: Kodak Ektar 100 is a professional colour negative film delivering extremely fine grain and very high colour saturation.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain remains very low at ISO 100
technical_specs.age_effects: colour shift toward magenta when expired
technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: almost no visible grain; very sharp scans

film_info.description: Kodak Gold 200 is an ISO 200 colour negative film designed for everyday shooting, offering good sharpness and resolution for consumer use.

technical_specs.age_effects: fades and colour shifts with age

film_info.description: Kodak UltraMax 400 is a high-speed colour negative film aimed at consumers, offering fine grain and vibrant colour for its speed.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain visible but controlled at ISO 400

film_info.description: Fujicolor Pro 400H is a professional ISO 400 colour film prized for smooth fine grain and accurate colour reproduction.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: very fine grain for ISO 400 (Sigma-grain tech)

film_info.description: Fujicolor Pro 160S is a professional ISO 160 colour film delivering exceptionally fine grain, smooth tones and generous latitude.

distinctive_traits: Balanced colour with a hint of green

film_info.description: Fujifilm Superia 400 is a consumer ISO 400 colour negative film offering vibrant colours and decent grain for everyday use.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: moderate grain controlled by Sigma-grain tech

film_info.description: Fujifilm C200 is an affordable ISO 200 color negative film for general use with balanced color and moderate grain.
Fujifilm Natura 1600 is a specialized ISO 1600 color negative film for low-light, known for its unique color rendition and visible grain.
Agfa Vista 200 is a popular budget ISO 200 color negative film with fine grain and vibrant colors.
Agfa Vista 400 is a budget ISO 400 color negative film with high sharpness and saturated colors, aimed at general photography.

distinctive_traits: Color reversal with extremely fine grain

film_info.description: Kodak Ektachrome E100 is a daylight-balanced E6 slide film with extremely fine grain and vibrant colors.

distinctive_traits: Extremely fine grain and bright colors

film_info.description: Kodak Elite Chrome 100 is a daylight E6 slide film with extremely fine grain and vivid color rendition.
Fuji Velvia 50 is a daylight E6 slide film famous for extremely high color saturation, high contrast, and very fine grain.

technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: very high resolution, grain not seen

film_info.description: Fuji Velvia 100 is a daylight slide film with very high color saturation and fine grain, similar in character to Velvia 50.
Fujichrome Provia 100F is a professional ISO 100 slide film with ultrafine grain and medium color saturation.

technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: grain almost invisible, excellent for scanning

film_info.description: Fujichrome Provia 400X is an ISO 400 slide film offering fine grain and vivid, true-to-life color.

technical_specs.age_effects: stable due to Slide film consistency

film_info.description: Agfa CT Precisa 100 is a daylight E6 slide film known for very high color saturation and contrast.
Kodak Vision3 50D is a low-speed color negative motion picture film optimized for daylight, with fine grain and wide dynamic range.
Kodak Vision3 200T is a versatile ISO 200 motion picture film balanced for tungsten light, featuring fine grain and rich color rendition.

distinctive_traits: Advanced Dye Layering reduces grain in shadows

film_info.description: Kodak Vision3 500T is a high-speed tungsten-balanced motion picture film featuring improved grain and extended highlight latitude.

technical_specs.iso_grain_relationship: grain improved by Dye Layering Tech

film_info.description: CineStill 50D is a modified motion-picture film (based on Vision3 50D) repurposed for still photography, offering fine grain and unique highlight halation.
CineStill 800T is a variant of a tungsten-balanced motion-picture film (Vision3 500T) for still use, ISO 800, known for its fast speed, halation, and color fidelity.

technical_specs.scanner_artifacts: blue halation and strong grain in scans
